turkish_example_sentence: Ben bu önemli kararı erken yapmışsam, başarılı olurdum.
english_example_sentence: If I had made this important decision early, I would have succeeded.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я принял это важное решение рано, я бы преуспел.
